info.description: REST APIs for Azure Active Directory Connect Health
info.title: ADHybridHealthService

parameters.description: The service property filter to apply.
parameters.name: $filter

parameters.description: The service type for the services onboarded to Azure Active Directory Connect Health. Depending on whether the service is monitoring, ADFS, Sync or ADDS roles, the service type can either be AdFederationService or AadSyncService or AdDomainService.
parameters.name: serviceType

parameters.description: The skip count, which specifies the number of elements that can be bypassed from a sequence and then return the remaining elements.
parameters.name: skipCount

parameters.description: The take count , which specifies the number of elements that can be returned from a sequence.
parameters.name: takeCount

200.description: The list of Active Directory Domain Controller services.

get.description: Gets the details of Active Directory Domain Service, for a tenant, that are onboarded to Azure Active Directory Connect Health.

200.description: Adds the Active Directory Domain Controller Services.

post.description: Onboards a service for a given tenant in Azure Active Directory Connect Health.

parameters.name: serviceName

parameters.description: Indicates if the service will be permanently deleted or disabled. True indicates that the service will be permanently deleted and False indicates that the service will be marked disabled and then deleted after 30 days, if it is not re-registered.
parameters.name: confirm

apiVersionParameter.description: The version of the API to be used with the client request.

AdditionalInformation.description: The additional information for a property.

hasProperties.description: Indicates if properties are present or not.

properties.description: The list of properties which are included in the additional information.

titleName.description: The title name for the property.

titleValue.description: The title value for the property.

AddsConfiguration.description: The list of key value properties.

continuationToken.description: The continuation token for paginated calls.

nextLink.description: The link used to get the next page of operations.

value.description: The value returned by the operation.

AddsServiceMember.description: The server details for ADDS service.

activeAlerts.description: The total number of alerts that are currently active for the server.

additionalInformation.description: The additional information, if any, for the server.

createdDate.description: The date time , in UTC, when the server was onboarded to Azure Active Directory Connect Health.

dcTypes.description: The list of domain controller types.

dimensions.description: The server specific configuration related dimensions.

disabled.description: Indicates if the server is disabled or not.

disabledReason.description: The reason for disabling the server.

gcReachable.description: Indicates if the global catalog for this domain is reachable or not.

installedQfes.description: The list of installed QFEs for the server.

isAdvertising.description: Indicates if the Dc is advertising or not.

lastDisabled.description: The date and time , in UTC, when the server was last disabled.

lastReboot.description: The date and time, in UTC, when the server was last rebooted.

lastServerReportedMonitoringLevelChange.description: The date and time, in UTC, when the server's data monitoring configuration was last changed.

lastUpdated.description: The date and time, in UTC, when the server properties were last updated.

monitoringConfigurationsComputed.description: The monitoring configuration of the server which determines what activities are monitored by Azure Active Directory Connect Health.

monitoringConfigurationsCustomized.description: The customized monitoring configuration of the server which determines what activities are monitored by Azure Active Directory Connect Health.

osName.description: The name of the operating system installed in the machine.

osVersion.description: The version of the operating system installed in the machine.

pdcReachable.description: Indicates if the primary domain controller is reachable or not.

recommendedQfes.description: The list of recommended hotfixes for the server.

resolvedAlerts.description: The total count of alerts that are resolved for this server.

role.description: The service role that is being monitored in the server.

serverReportedMonitoringLevel.description: The monitoring level reported by the server.

serviceId.description: The service id to whom this server belongs.

status.description: The health status of the server.

sysvolState.description: Indicates if the SYSVOL state is healthy or not.

tenantId.description: The tenant id to whom this server belongs.
